Sequence Information.Peptide Name: P2 (LL-37(5-24) analog, Arg-rich, synthetic AMPs, XXA, UCLL1c)
Sequence Information.Source: sequence truncation, amino acid SUBSTITUTION, human cathelicidin analog, animal-derived, natural derivatives

Literature Information.Literature: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals that this sequence is similar (68%) toLL-25R: 40%, F: 15%.Activity: active against S. aureus (MIC 22 ug/ml), B. subtilis (MIC 25 ug/ml), E. coli (MIC 20 ug/ml), and P. aeruginosa (MIC 25 ug/ml).Structure: random coil in buffer and helical in TFE or SDS.In vitro toxicity: not hemo.lytic till 100 uM.
Literature Information.Author: Krishnamoorthy R, Adhikari P, Anaikutti P. 2023
Literature Information.Title: Design, synthesis, and characterization of non-hemolytic antimicrobial peptides related to human cathelicidin LL-37.
